 Subtracting the lower bound of a finite set of sequential integers from an element of this set.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 29-Mar-2018.)  Obsolete version of ~ elfzmlbm as of 25-Mar-2020. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
